reviewText: The CHARLIE AND LOLA #9: WHAT CAN I WEAR FOR HALLOWEEN? is a nearly two-hour DVD with 9 different episodes. There's actually only one episode that has a Halloween theme, but the others are fun to watch.The show focuses on a British boy and his younger sister--named Charlie and Lola--and their friends. Each cartoon teaches kids about sharing and how to deal with disappointments by looking at problems in a different way.Although the animation is relatively simple, the mixed media used to create the graphics is very clever and leads to interesting visuals.The voice actors are wonderful as the characters "Charlie" and his younger sister "Lola," and their friends "Marv" and "Lotta," along with other kids either at school or in the neighborhood.The DVD menus are interactive and you can choose either "play-all" or "episode selection."Nice treat for kids, and adults who enjoy cartoons.
Title: Charlie and Lola: Volume 9: What Can I Wear for Halloween?

reviewText: In my opinion, this is one of the best kid tv shows out there. Please see my review for the Volume 1-8 set for a full description of the show. Highly recommended.  http://www.amazon.com/review/R3138CN7M1RIUV
summary: see my review for the volume 1-8 set
Title: Charlie and Lola: Volume 9: What Can I Wear for Halloween?

reviewText: Absolutely love these cartoons! This disk sadly I have purchased three times now and all three copies skip! Between the three I can view most if the episodes!
summary: Love the cartoon 5 stars 0 stars for skipping disks!!!
Title: Charlie and Lola: Volume 9: What Can I Wear for Halloween?

reviewText: I love when my children watch charlie and lola.  It's a show that I don't cringe during or get sick of after 2 episodes.  Only two episodes on this have to do with halloween/fall.  But they're all fun and it got its full use around Halloween time.
summary: i love watching charlie and lola
Title: Charlie and Lola: Volume 9: What Can I Wear for Halloween?

reviewText: we love this show. it is not on cable in this area anymore so these dvds are the next best thing.
Title: Charlie and Lola: Volume 9: What Can I Wear for Halloween?
